On building software for people

User Obsessed: Behind the Scenes

User Obsessed is designed, written and built by Joe Fiorini.

Tools

  • Custom designed using Keynote, Photoshop and Mobilicious People Icons.
  • Powered by Jekyll
  • All code built by hand using Vim
  • Headings are Helvetica and paragraph text is Tisa Web Pro from TypeKit
  • Code snippets colored by Pygments using the manni theme
  • Writing done on Mac using Scrivener and on the iPhone/iPad in Notesy and Nebulous Notes (synced via Dropbox)
  • Hosted on […][]

About

User Obsessed is a blog that explores the role developers play in defining the way users experience software. See more.

The Author

My name is Joe Fiorini. I am a web developer from Cleveland, Ohio. I work for LeanDog Software where I build software using Ruby on Rails. See more.
